product_summary: RunGPT is an extension that lets you execute code snippets directly within OpenAI's chat interface. It supports multiple languages, data parsing, visualizations, and file attachments. It offers a safe and secure sandboxed execution environment, making it easy to test and debug code without installing anything on your computer.
product_pros: Easy to use: Execute code snippets directly within ChatGPT with a single click.
Supports multiple languages: Python, JavaScript, Ruby, and more.
Data parsing and visualization: Load, parse, and visualize data using popular libraries like matplotlib and pandas.
File attachments: Send additional files along with your code snippets.
Safe and secure: Remote sandboxed execution system ensures security.
product_cons: Limited functionality: May not support all the features of a dedicated coding environment.
Slow execution: Execution speed may be slower compared to running code locally on your computer.
Lack of advanced debugging: Limited debugging capabilities compared to specialized development tools.
May require some technical knowledge: Users may need some programming experience to fully utilize the extension.
Relies on ChatGPT availability: The extension's functionality is dependent on the availability and performance of the ChatGPT service.

product_usecases.details: Quickly prototype and test different coding approaches, experiment with new libraries and frameworks.
Analyze and visualize data using popular libraries like matplotlib, seaborn, pandas, and plotly.
Explore APIs, or build full-fledged apps right within the chat.
Learn programming concepts and experiment with code in a hands-on environment.
Edit and modify code, attach files, and execute code directly within ChatGPT, saving time and effort.

product_toolfor.details: Test and debug code, explore APIs, and build apps.
Analyze and visualize data using familiar libraries.
Teach programming concepts and provide students with a hands-on coding environment.
Enhance ChatGPT's capabilities by extending its functionality with code execution.
Experiment with code and learn programming in a user-friendly environment.
